meanings.definition: A small, close-fitting hat worn on the head.
meanings.sent1: I wore my favorite beanie to keep my head warm.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new beanie with a pom-pom on top.
meanings.sent3: The beanie flew off my head in the strong wind!
meanings.sent4: Her beanie was like a cozy hug for her head.
meanings.sent5: The bright red beanie stood out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: A small, round seed of a plant, often used for food.
meanings.sent1: The chef added beans to the soup for extra protein.
meanings.sent2: She planted beanies in her garden to grow fresh vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The beanie rolled off the plate and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: The beanie was a tiny powerhouse of nutrition.
meanings.sent5: Each beanie held the promise of a new plant.

meanings.definition: A type of soft, cozy fabric often used for making hats or other clothing items.
meanings.sent1: The beanie fabric felt warm against my skin.
meanings.sent2: She sewed a beanie lining into her winter coat.
meanings.sent3: The beanie material was so soft, it felt like a cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her beanie scarf was a gentle embrace around her neck.
meanings.sent5: The beanie material was as comforting as a hug.
